Employee: Carolynne Waterhouse
Report Date: 2022-05-19
Doctor: Christie Pilossof
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.
Comment Key: ChronicMedicationList
Comment Value: antihypertensive
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Overall low risk
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: BP 141/91; Due for gynae check up
Colonoscopy screening discussed; Follow up with Dermatologist

------------------------------
Employee: Carolynne Waterhouse
Report Date: 2022-05-19

Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.

Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Please book your various follow up appointments as discussed
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.

Colonoscopy screening discussed; Follow up with Dermatologist

Men's Health Recommendations:

Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Overview Notes: Please book your various follow up appointments as discussed

Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Overall low risk
Comment Key: ClinicalExamRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Clinical Recommendations: 
Men's Health Recommendations:

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Your audiology screen was abnormal - please book a full audiology assessment

Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.

Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.
Comment Key: LifestyleNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Nil
Comment Key: LifestyleNote

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Please book your various follow up appointments as discussed
Comment Key: LifestyleRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Employee: Carolynne Waterhouse
Report Date: 2022-05-19
Doctor: Christie Pilossof
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.

Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Overall low risk
Comment Key: MedicalHistoryRecommendation
Comment Value: -Continue managing & monitoring the chronic conditions as you have been. 
-Continue screening for cancer as advised.
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Overview Notes: Your audiology screen was abnormal - please book a full audiology assessment
Comment Key: MedicalHistoryRecommendation
Comment Value: -Continue managing & monitoring the chronic conditions as you have been. 
-Continue screening for cancer as advised.
Special Investigation Notes: Nil
------------------------------

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.

Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: 0
Comment Key: MentalHealthMoodRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil
------------------------------
Employee: Carolynne Waterhouse
Report Date: 2022-05-19
Doctor: Christie Pilossof
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.

Doctor: Christie Pilossof
Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: Nil
Comment Key: MentalHealthMoodRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: 0
Comment Key: MentalHealthStressRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Comment Key: ReportNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Men's Health Recommendations:

Comment Key: SpecialInvestigationNote

Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: BP 141/91; Due for gynae check up
Colonoscopy screening discussed; Follow up with Dermatologist
Comment Key: SymptomScreeningNote
Comment Value: None

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: Overall low risk
Comment Key: SymptomScreeningNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.

Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: BP 141/91; Due for gynae check up
Colonoscopy screening discussed; Follow up with Dermatologist

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Overview Notes: 0
Comment Key: VitalsNote
Comment Value: 0
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Overview Notes: Take a good omega 3 supplement, magnesium and CoQ10 as we discussed
Comment Key: VitalsRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.
Comment Key: VitalsRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil
------------------------------

Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Keep up to date with cancer screening.
-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.

Clinical Recommendations:

Special Investigation Notes: Nil

Employee: Carolynne Waterhouse
Report Date: 2022-05-19

Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: -The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: -Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.
Overview Notes: Your blood pressure was high today. Please monitor it at home for a week, twice a day and if it is consistently above 130/85 then we need to start you on an antihypertensive.

-Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
